title: Mr. X
description:
This is a previously-published edition - ASIN: B00LYHTN3I Mr. X is ready for you, but are you ready for him?   USA TODAY BESTSELLING AUTHOR Clarissa Wild  brings you Mr. X, a dark Romance thriller, which is a stand alone without cliffhanger.  
~SIGNED LIMITED EDITION~
  *Author Note: This is not your average romance story. Some people will kill for love.*  He’s come to kill me. I’m a user and abuser of my own body. In the darkest hour I sold my soul to the devil and now I must pay the price. With his gun to my head I have no choice but to listen and obey, but I refuse to go down easily. Nothing is stronger than the will to survive. My instincts kicked into full gear the second he stepped into my motel room. Except when I look at him I see my own heart staring back at me. A history tainted by blood. I don’t know his name, but I know he wants me. To save myself I’ll sacrifice my sanity. My body. My soul. Something tells me the x-shaped scar that marks his eye is the only escape I have. He is Mr. X; the man who comes to claim my life. Can I save myself before he demands my heart?  
WARNING: This book contains very disturbing situations, strong language, drugs and alcohol, and graphic violence.
   No Cliffhanger. Complete at 90800 words. Stand Alone.
author: Clarissa Wild
